Events

Upcoming

We regularly host webinars for startups and small businesses to learn about the application process and what we look for when we review proposals. Can’t make it to a webinar? Watch a recorded webinar about the Project Pitch Pilot or a recorded webinar about How to Apply.

Annual events

You can often find NSF staff at major tradeshows and events throughout the year. Here’s a calendar of some of the events we plan on attending in 2018 through 2019:

  • Jan

    • Consumer Electronics Show (CES)

      Find program staff in Eureka Park.

    • J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference

      Find program staff to learn about funding opportunities.

  • Feb

    • HIMSS19 Global Conference & Exhibition

    • SPIE Photonics West

    • AUTM Annual Meeting

  • Mar

    • SXSW

      Find program staff to learn about funding opportunities.

    • Venture Summit West

      NSF staff introduces investors and startups to the program.

    • VentureWell Open Conference

    • ACS National Meeting and Expo

  • Apr

    • ACA Summit

    • MIT Energy Conference

  • May

    • SBIR Road Tour

      NSF program directors join other funding agencies on a bus tour to speak about funding opportunities.

    • Kauffman's ESHIP Summit

  • Jun

    • International Society for Technology in Education

    • BIO International Convention

    • National SBIR Conference

      Join NSF and other government agencies with similar programs for the annual conference.

    • WEAR Conference

  • Jul

    • New York Venture Summit

      NSF staff introduces investors and startups to the program.

    • ARPA-E's Tech Showcase

      Find program staff at the Tech Showcase.

  • Aug

    • SBIR Road Tour

      NSF program directors join other funding agencies on a bus tour to speak about funding opportunities.

  • Sep

    • SynBioBeta

    • Black Enterprise - Tech Connext

    • SBIR Road Tour

      NSF program directors join other funding agencies on a bus tour to speak about funding opportunities.

  • Oct

    • TechCrunch Disrupt

    • SBIR/STTR Fall Innovation Summit

    • Tough Tech Summit

    • EmTech

    • SOCAP - Social Capital Markets

  • Nov

  • Dec
